mapper.sql: C_ID, U_ID, C_BRAND, C_SERIES, C_RELEASEYEAR, C_VOLUME, C_GEARTYPE, C_CODE, C_MODEL, C_LICENCETIME, C_DISTANCE, C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, C_PRICE, C_COUNT, C_IMG, C_SJTIME, C_TYPE, C_STATE, C_SCCOUNT, C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, C_MCSJ
mapper.select:
select * from(select rownum rn , b.* from (select to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ
from carinfo a where a.c_state=#{cState} order by c_count desc) b where rownum <5)

select to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ from carinfo a where u_id=#{uId}
select rownum, a.* from( select count(*) c,c_brand from carinfo b where c_state='交易完成' group by c_brand ) a where rownum<11

select * from (select rownum ,to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ from carinfo a where c_state='在售' order by c_count desc ) where rownum <11

select * from(select rownum rn , b.* from (select to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ from carinfo a where a.c_brand=#{cBrand} and a.c_state=#{cState} order by c_count desc) b where rownum<5)

select * from(select rownum rn , b.* from (select to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ from carinfo a where a.c_state=#{cState} order by c_sjtime desc ) b where rownum<4)

select rownum rn ,b.* from(select * from(select rownum rn , b.* from(select to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ from carinfo a where a.c_state=#{cState} order by c_sjtime desc) b where rownum<5))b where rn>3

select * from(select rownum rn , b.* from (select to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ from carinfo a where a.c_type=#{cType} and a.c_state=#{cState} order by c_count desc) b where rownum<5)

select to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ from carinfo where a c_brand=#{cBrand}

select to_char(a.C_licencetime,'yyyy-mm') as C_licencetime,a.C_ID,a.U_ID,a.C_BRAND,a.C_SERIES,a.C_RELEASEYEAR, a.C_VOLUME,a.C_GEARTYPE, a.C_CODE, a.C_MODEL, a.C_DISTANCE, a.C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, a.C_PRICE, a.C_COUNT, a.C_IMG, a.C_SJTIME, a.C_TYPE, a.C_STATE, a.C_SCCOUNT, a.C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, a.C_MCSJ from carinfo a where c_type=#{cType}
select * from(select rownum rn , b.* from (select a.* from carinfo a where a.u_id=#{uId} order by c_sjtime desc) b where rownum<2)
mapper.insert: insert into CARINFO (C_ID, U_ID, C_BRAND, C_SERIES, C_RELEASEYEAR, C_VOLUME, C_GEARTYPE, C_CODE, C_MODEL, C_LICENCETIME, C_DISTANCE, C_EMISSIONSTANDARD, C_PRICE, C_COUNT, C_IMG, C_SJTIME, C_TYPE, C_STATE, C_SCCOUNT, C_CZZX, NEWPRICE, C_MCSJ) values (#{cId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cReleaseyear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cGeartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cLicencetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cDistance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cEmissionstandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSjtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cCzzx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cMcsj,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into CARINFO
C_ID,
U_ID,
C_BRAND,
C_SERIES,
C_RELEASEYEAR,
C_VOLUME,
C_GEARTYPE,
C_CODE,
C_MODEL,
C_LICENCETIME,
C_DISTANCE,
C_EMISSIONSTANDARD,
C_PRICE,
C_COUNT,
C_IMG,
C_SJTIME,
C_TYPE,
C_STATE,
C_SCCOUNT,
C_CZZX,
NEWPRICE,
C_MCSJ,
seq_carinfo.nextval,
#{uId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cReleaseyear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cGeartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_date(#{cLicencetime},'yyyy/mm'),
#{cDistance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cEmissionstandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_date(#{cSjtime},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:mi:ss'),
#{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cSccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cCzzx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{newprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cMcsj,jdbcType=DATE},
mapper.update:
update CARINFO
U_ID = #{uId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_BRAND = #{cBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SERIES = #{cSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_RELEASEYEAR = #{cReleaseyear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_VOLUME = #{cVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_GEARTYPE = #{cGeartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CODE = #{cCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_MODEL = #{cModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_LICENCETIME = to_date(#{cLicencetime},'yyyy/mm'),
C_DISTANCE = #{cDistance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_EMISSIONSTANDARD = #{cEmissionstandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_PRICE = #{cPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_COUNT = #{cCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_IMG = #{cImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TYPE = #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_STATE = #{cState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SCCOUNT = #{cSccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_CZZX = #{cCzzx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEWPRICE = #{newprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_MCSJ = #{cMcsj,jdbcType=DATE},
where C_ID = #{cId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update CARINFO set U_ID = #{uId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_BRAND = #{cBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SERIES = #{cSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_RELEASEYEAR = #{cReleaseyear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_VOLUME = #{cVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_GEARTYPE = #{cGeartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_CODE = #{cCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_MODEL = #{cModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_LICENCETIME = #{cLicencetime,jdbcType=DATE}, C_DISTANCE = #{cDistance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_EMISSIONSTANDARD = #{cEmissionstandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_PRICE = #{cPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_COUNT = #{cCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_IMG = #{cImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SJTIME = #{cSjtime,jdbcType=DATE}, C_TYPE = #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_STATE = #{cState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SCCOUNT = #{cSccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_CZZX = #{cCzzx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEWPRICE = #{newprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_MCSJ = #{cMcsj,jdbcType=DATE} where C_ID = #{cId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
